channel.title: ComplexPK/Online/Great Community/Always updates/PVP-ECO/718/
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/izowo5.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JruQFRw.png[/img][/center] [center][sup][sub][url=http://complexpk.com/]http://complexpk.com/[/url][/sub][/sup][/center]
[center]Engine load: 1% per 20 players (can hold over 1500 players without lag) Hard Economy MAC Address Ban Added customized torva w/ other custom objects dominion tower (to obtain a cool object) 100% like RuneScape. (just has one little bug) (will be fixed asap) All skills redone and working 100% Slayer tasks working great Slayer tower with all NPC's and correctly Drops RuneSpan fully Clipped Vote System with Rewards Donate system with big Rewards Brawling Gloves Duel Arena 100% Working Fight kiln 100% Soulwars
customized Home like no other be for All Dupes FIXED Dice Game with Percentile and 2-6 sided to Dice Duel Flower Game Seal Game Loyalty Shops & titles Player Following Clipped Player Walking Clipped Npc Following Clipped Npc Walking Clipped 728 Gameframe 718 Hitmarkers 718 Maps & Objects 718-728 Characters 718-738 Items (added custom nex armour, max cape, veteran and comp) 718-738 Animations & GFX Curses Clan chat Correctly wear item for every holiday item Correctly yo-yo emotes Christmas cracker (working) Home and shops as home And alot more fixes, and updates we did, but it isn't so important to show there.
All fight modes clipped and right. Items switching's fast Every items with correctly animations & special attacks Prayers and curses all working correctly Kill/Death Ratio Wilderness teleport to: Mage Bank, revenants (30 Wild), multideep (51 Wild), Multi-Easts (44 Wild).
All drops of NPC's 100% correctly Slayer tower's with right drops and npc spawns. Corporeal beast Dagannoth kings Godwars Fight Caves (Jad) Nex Vergo Party Demon Lots more bosses. More will be added soon.
All has been re-done, working 100% ::Crystal for all your need to know command for a area with most of skills combat dungeoneering . Skills are clipped, with good rate, and we have highscores. And more[/center]
[center]Video is better in fullscreen and HD[/center] [center][spoiler][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5QCyt49m_dw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/spoiler][/center]
[center]Images[/center] [center][spoiler] There are no pking pictures no one was on at the time [img]http://i.imgur.com/LK7zD1d.png[/img] All your Teleporting needs [img]http://i.imgur.com/C35fvpf.png[/img] dominion tower [img]http://i.imgur.com/icalwKB.png[/img] New Home [img]http://i.imgur.com/fcwObTd.jpg[/img] Working dungeoneering [img]http://i.imgur.com/fFs2M8o.png[/img]Top 17 and growing [img]http://i.imgur.com/wFCB1dn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HQoqmwZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QuvTQpc.png[/img][/spoiler][/center]
Will post more Picture just adding a few more patches and repricing and new items

item.title: ComplexPK/Online/Great Community/Always updates/PVP-ECO/718/
item.dc:creator: @calem calem
item.description:
@calem wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][/center]
[center][sup][sub]http://complexpk.com/[/sub][/sup][/center]

[center]Engine load: 1% per 20 players (can hold over 1500 players without lag)
Hard Economy
MAC Address Ban
Added customized torva w/ other custom objects
dominion tower (to obtain a cool object) 100% like RuneScape. (just has one little bug) (will be fixed asap)
All skills redone and working 100%
Slayer tasks working great
Slayer tower with all NPC’s and correctly Drops
RuneSpan fully Clipped
Vote System with Rewards
Donate system with big Rewards
Brawling Gloves
Duel Arena 100% Working
Fight kiln 100%
Soulwars

customized Home like no other be for
All Dupes FIXED
Dice Game with Percentile and 2-6 sided to Dice Duel
Flower Game
Seal Game
Loyalty Shops & titles
Player Following Clipped
Player Walking Clipped
Npc Following Clipped
Npc Walking Clipped
728 Gameframe
718 Hitmarkers
718 Maps & Objects
718-728 Characters
718-738 Items (added custom nex armour, max cape, veteran and comp)
718-738 Animations & GFX
Curses
Clan chat
Correctly wear item for every holiday item
Correctly yo-yo emotes
Christmas cracker (working)
Home and shops as home
And alot more fixes, and updates we did, but it isn’t so important to show there.

All fight modes clipped and right.
Items switching’s fast
Every items with correctly animations & special attacks
Prayers and curses all working correctly
Kill/Death Ratio
Wilderness teleport to: Mage Bank, revenants (30 Wild), multideep (51 Wild), Multi-Easts (44 Wild).

All drops of NPC’s 100% correctly
Slayer tower’s with right drops and npc spawns.
Corporeal beast
Dagannoth kings
Godwars
Fight Caves (Jad)
Nex
Vergo
Party Demon
Lots more bosses.
More will be added soon.

All has been re-done, working 100%
::Crystal for all your need to know command for a area with most of skills combat dungeoneering .
Skills are clipped, with good rate, and we have highscores.
And more[/center]

[center]Video is better in fullscreen and HD[/center]
[center][spoiler][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5QCyt49m_dw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/spoiler][/center]

dominion tower

New Home
